verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1352><s%> leaving <S%G863><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> principles <S%G746><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> doctrine <S%G3056><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> let us go on <S%G5342><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> perfection; <S%G5047><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> laying <S%G2598><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> the foundation <S%G2310><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%> from <S%G575><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> toward <S%G1909><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

Of the doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of baptisms, <S%G909><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> of laying on <S%G1936><s%> of hands, <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> of resurrection <S%G386><s%> of the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> judgment. <S%G2917><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it is impossible <S%G102><s%> for those who were once enlightened, <S%G5461><s%> <S%G530><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> have tasted <S%G1089><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> heavenly <S%G2032><s%> gift, <S%G1431><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were made <S%G1096><s%> partakers <S%G3353><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> have tasted <S%G1089><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> the powers <S%G1411><s%> of the world <S%G165><s%> to come, <S%G3195><s%>

If they <S%G2532><s%> shall fall away, <S%G3895><s%> to renew <S%G340><s%> them again <S%G3825><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> repentance; <S%G3341><s%> seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God afresh, <S%G388><s%> <S%G1438><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> put him to an open shame. <S%G3856><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> which drinketh in <S%G4095><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> rain <S%G5205><s%> that cometh <S%G2064><s%> oft <S%G4178><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bringeth forth <S%G5088><s%> herbs <S%G1008><s%> meet <S%G2111><s%> for them <S%G1565><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> it is <S%G2532><s%> dressed, <S%G1090><s%> receiveth <S%G3335><s%> blessing <S%G2129><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God: <S%G2316><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> that which beareth <S%G1627><s%> thorns <S%G173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> briars <S%G5146><s%> is rejected, <S%G96><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is nigh unto <S%G1451><s%> cursing; <S%G2671><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> is to be burned. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G2740><s%>

But, <S%G1161><s%> beloved, <S%G27><s%> we are persuaded <S%G3982><s%> better things <S%G2909><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> things that accompany <S%G2192><s%> salvation, <S%G4991><s%> though <S%G1499><s%> we thus <S%G3779><s%> speak. <S%G2980><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> unrighteous <S%G94><s%> to forget <S%G1950><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> labor <S%G2873><s%> of love, <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye have showed <S%G1731><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> in that ye have ministered <S%G1247><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> saints, <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> do minister. <S%G1247><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> we desire <S%G1937><s%> that every one <S%G1538><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> do show <S%G1731><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G846><s%> diligence <S%G4710><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> full assurance <S%G4136><s%> of hope <S%G1680><s%> unto <S%G891><s%> the end: <S%G5056><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> ye be <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> slothful, <S%G3576><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> followers <S%G3402><s%> of them who through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> patience <S%G3115><s%> inherit <S%G2816><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> promises. <S%G1860><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> when God <S%G2316><s%> made promise <S%G1861><s%> to Abraham, <S%G11><s%> because <S%G1893><s%> he could <S%G2192><s%> swear <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> greater, <S%G3187><s%> he swore <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> Surely <S%G2229><s%> <S%G3375><s%> blessing <S%G2127><s%> I will bless <S%G2127><s%> thee, <S%G4571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> multiplying <S%G4129><s%> I will multiply <S%G4129><s%> thee. <S%G4571><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> so, <S%G3779><s%> after he had patiently endured, <S%G3114><s%> he obtained <S%G2013><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> promise. <S%G1860><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> men <S%G444><s%> verily <S%G3303><s%> swear <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> greater: <S%G3187><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> an oath <S%G3727><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> confirmation <S%G951><s%> is to them <S%G846><s%> an end <S%G4009><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> strife. <S%G485><s%>

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> willing <S%G1014><s%> more abundantly <S%G4054><s%> to show <S%G1925><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> heirs <S%G2818><s%> of promise <S%G1860><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> immutability <S%G276><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> counsel, <S%G1012><s%> confirmed <S%G3315><s%> it by an oath: <S%G3727><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> immutable <S%G276><s%> things, <S%G4229><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> it was impossible <S%G102><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> to lie, <S%G5574><s%> we might have <S%G2192><s%> a strong <S%G2478><s%> consolation, <S%G3874><s%> who have fled for refuge <S%G2703><s%> to lay hold upon <S%G2902><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> set before <S%G4295><s%> us:

Which <S%G3739><s%> hope we have <S%G2192><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> an anchor <S%G45><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> soul, <S%G5590><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> sure <S%G804><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> steadfast, <S%G949><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> which entereth <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> that within <S%G2082><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> veil; <S%G2665><s%>

Whither <S%G3699><s%> the forerunner <S%G4274><s%> is for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> entered, <S%G1525><s%> even Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> a high priest <S%G749><s%> forever <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchizedek. <S%G3198><s%>
